title: Published Pieces
description: Before realizing my passion for creative writing, I enjoyed a summer of reporting at the Columbia Missourian during the summer of 2020. This summer posed a unique set of challenges. The first challenge was transitioning all newspaper operations to a fully virtual work environment, while publishing a daily print and online edition. The second challenge was on-the-ground reporting during a summer of pandemic restrictions and civil unrest.

title: Agency Work
description: This campaign spanned 4 social media platforms (instagram, twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook), with a a hybrid paid and organic media strategy. The goal? Garner interest for the annual 'State of The YAYA Report.' As lead copywriter, I played an integral role in the development of the campaign story, social media copy, print report, and presentation + script. To attract the distracted eyes and content preferences of Gen Z, our campaign personified that mysterious, macabre feel that's in-tune with Gen Z's horror genre fascination.

title: Team
description: Team Dashboard is a Node command-line application that takes in information about employees to generate a dynamic HTML web page.

title: Quiz
description: A quiz app on the fundamentals of JavaScript. There are 5 randomly selected multiple-choice questions and the user will have a time limit of 50 seconds. The remaining time will determine their score at the end. The user will be penalised by 10 seconds for every incorrect answer.

title: P1
description: Welcome to P1, your virtual pit stop for the latest updates and standings in the world of F1. But that's not allâ€”we've also got the ultimate card game where driver knowledge is the key to victory.

title: Planner
description: Make every hour count with this simple Daily Planner App. You can keep track of all important appointments during a normal 9-5 work day!
